allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add email agent with Gmail integration, Claude AI classification, and dashboard

- Google OAuth authentication with Gmail API access
- Claude-powered email categorization \(To Respond, FYI, Comment, etc.\)
- Auto-draft responses for emails requiring reply
- Gmail label management and sync
- Real-time dashboard with auto-polling
- User settings with customizable categories

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Overhaul labels system - remove prefix, add smart label management

- Remove label_prefix feature entirely \(labels now use category names directly\)
- Add our_label_ids tracking to only manage labels we created
- Add updateLabel function to rename existing Gmail labels
- Smart sync: rename changed labels, delete only our labels, never touch others
- Protect user''s existing Gmail labels \(like Fyxer''s\) from deletion

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
